body.p: Alarm and status data as well as waveform data can be transmitted to remote locations via Modbus RTU, WEB and E-mail as standard. Data can also be transferred via any of the following protocols as options: ModBus TCP/IP, SNMP, land line Modem or cell Modem.

This information can also be down loaded locally via, PC using USB port or Optional memory stick or using a PDA using IR. Contact the Eaton Factory or your local Sales representative regarding this option.
